title: Arrival in Phandalin
summary: The party arrived in Phandalin, delivered supplies to Barthen's Provisions, and learned about the Redbrand threat terrorizing the town. At the Stonehill Inn, Ekran said heartfelt goodbyes and departed to pursue his own mission. After drinking heavily, a drunk Belden spotted Redbrands at the Sleeping Giant taphouse and charged in, triggering a street fight that ended on a cliffhanger as reinforcements were called.

best_moments.title: Ekran's Farewell
best_moments.description: Ekran said goodbye to the party with heartfelt words for each member before departing to pursue his personal mission.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM (Ekran)
quotes.text: Your hammer hits harder than you think. And your heart's even stronger. Don't forget that.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM (Ekran)
quotes.text: You kept us together more than once, whether you realize it or not. Firelight doesn't just burn—it guides.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM (Ekran)
quotes.text: I think you see more than the rest of us combined. Watch their backs.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM (Ekran)
quotes.text: I hope we cross paths again.

quotes.speaker: Richard/Semaj
quotes.text: Before he walks out the door, Samaj raises a toast: To Ekran!

best_moments.title: The Redbrand Threat
best_moments.description: Elsa at Barthen's Provisions warned the party about the Redbrands—thugs terrorizing Phandalin, shaking down merchants, and making people disappear.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM (Elsa)
quotes.text: These Redbrands, they're just thugs. Cowards with blades. Half the town is too scared to speak against them. The other half gets paid to look the other way.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM (Elsa)
quotes.text: They are killers. And some of them, too quiet to be street thugs.

best_moments.title: Drunk Belden Charges In
best_moments.description: After drinking heavily at the Stonehill Inn, Belden spotted Redbrands at the Sleeping Giant and immediately charged toward them without a word.

quotes.speaker: Jen/Kaelia
quotes.text: I'm gonna scowl at Larry too, and start walking ahead of the group to go find the Redbrands.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: As you kind of drunkenly start to wander towards them, you pull out your warhammer... it's immediately going to have them draw their swords.

best_moments.title: Belden's Skull-Crushing Opener
best_moments.description: Belden leapt up onto the porch, smashed a Redbrand's skull in with his warhammer, and got sprayed with blood and brain matter.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: You're going to see this Redbrand's skull just start to cave in as this hammer just goes straight through the top of it. There is a sickening crunch as skull fragments and blood just spray everywhere.

quotes.speaker: Sean/Belden
quotes.text: I'm going to pick my hammer back up and use the sleeve of my right arm to wipe some of the blood off my face.

best_moments.title: Redbrand Trips Down Stairs
best_moments.description: The first Redbrand to charge Belden immediately tripped on his shoelaces and fell prone down the stairs.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: As this Redbrand rushes at you with full confidence, he is going to trip down the stairs. His shoelace got stuck, and he just tumbles down in front of you, prone.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: You're gonna see the other Redbrands just facepalm: Joseph, you idiot.

best_moments.title: Larry Gets Slashed
best_moments.description: A Redbrand attacked Larry, cutting him across the back. The party quickly rallied to protect their good boy.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: Let's get rid of this mutt! He cuts Larry right across the back. You're gonna hear a little yelp from Larry.

quotes.speaker: Richard/Semaj
quotes.text: I'm going to do a healing word on Larry.

best_moments.title: Reinforcements Called
best_moments.description: The last standing Redbrand ran inside the Sleeping Giant, kicked open the door, and shouted for help.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: He's gonna kick the doors open and look at the Redbrands inside: WE GOT A FIRE ON OUR HANDS! And tonight, that is where we're gonna end it.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Alex/GM (Ekran)
quotes_of_the_session.quote: Your hammer hits harder than you think. And your heart's even stronger. Don't forget that.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes_of_the_session.context: Redbrands watching their friend trip down stairs

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Sean/Belden
quotes_of_the_session.quote: The last time this happened, I heard someone was eating dwarves and I failed my rage save. This time, I'm just drunk.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Alex/GM (Redbrand)
quotes_of_the_session.quote: Let's gut these heroes and use their skulls for mugs!

character_spotlights.moment: Got drunk at the Stonehill Inn, charged the Redbrands, smashed a skull on round one
Said heartfelt goodbyes to each party member before departing Phandalin forever
character_spotlights.one_liner: I hope we cross paths again.

character_spotlights.moment: Raised a toast to Ekran, then peppered a Redbrand with Magic Missile
Got slashed by a Redbrand, healed by Semaj, then bit back with vengeance
character_spotlights.one_liner: Larry's just going to nuzzle him and lick him.

plot_developments: Met Elsa and learned about the Redbrand threat
Ekran departed the party (player leaving campaign)
Sildar went to secure funds from the townmaster
Learned Redbrands have been terrorizing Phandalin
Started fight with Redbrands at the Sleeping Giant

npcs_encountered.name: Tolben
npcs_encountered.notes: Provided warm beds, cold ale, no nonsense

end_state.cliffhanger: A Redbrand just kicked open the tavern door shouting for backup
